message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you this product for $9,500. I think it would be a valuable addition for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $9,000 for it. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $9,300.  Would you be willing to meet me there?
